verses.verse: And <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G1448>came<s%> near to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> and <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> he <S%G649>sends<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

And <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5217>Go<s%> your way <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G2713>over<s%> <S%G2713>against<s%> you: and as <S%G2112>soon<s%> as you be <S%G1531>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> it, you shall <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied,<s%> where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> never <S%G3762><s%> <S%G4455><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2523>sat;<s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> him, and bring <S%G71><s%> him.

And they <S%G565>went<s%> their way, and <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> by the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> in a place <S%G296>where<s%> <S%G296>two<s%> <S%G296>ways<s%> <S%G296>met;<s%> and they <S%G3089>loose<s%> him.
And <S%G5100>certain<s%> of them that <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> you, <S%G3089>loosing<s%> the <S%G4454>colt?<s%>
And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to them <S%G2531>even<s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1781>commanded:<s%> and they <S%G863>let<s%> them <S%G863>go.<s%>
And they <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1911>cast<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1911>on<s%> him; and he <S%G2523>sat<s%> on him.

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4766>spread<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> in the <S%G3598>way:<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2875>cut<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G4746>branches<s%> <S%G1537>off<s%> the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> and <S%G4766>strewed<s%> them in the <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And they that <S%G4254>went<s%> <S%G4254>before,<s%> and they that <S%G190>followed,<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5614>Hosanna;<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>

<S%G2127>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1138>David,<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%> in the <S%G5310>highest.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple:<s%> and when he had <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G4017>round<s%> <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G3798>eventide<s%> <S%G5610><s%> was <S%G1511>come,<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G963>Bethany<s%> with the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>
And on the <S%G1887>morrow,<s%> when they were <S%G1831>come<s%> from <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> he was <S%G3983>hungry:<s%>

And <S%G1492>seeing<s%> a <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> off <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> he <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>haply<s%> he might <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> thing <S%G1722>thereon:<s%> <S%G846><s%> and when he <S%G2064>came<s%> to it, he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> but <S%G5444>leaves;<s%> for the <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G4810>figs<s%> was not yet.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to it, <S%G3367>No<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of you <S%G3371>hereafter<s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it.

And they <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> and <S%G59>bought<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G2690>overthrew<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%> of the <S%G2855>moneychangers,<s%> and the <S%G2515>seats<s%> of them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G4058>doves;<s%>
And would not <S%G863>suffer<s%> that <S%G1536>any<s%> man should <S%G1808>carry<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2411>temple.<s%>

And he <S%G2258>taught,<s%> <S%G1321><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, Is it not <S%G1125>written,<s%> My <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer?<s%> but you have <S%G4160>made<s%> it a <S%G4693>den<s%> of thieves. <S%G3027><s%>

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> him: for they <S%G5399>feared<s%> him, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> was <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1322>doctrine.<s%>
And <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3796>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G1607>went<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city.<s%>
And in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> as they <S%G3899>passed<s%> by, they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3583>dried<s%> up from the <S%G4491>roots.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G363>calling<s%> to <S%G364>remembrance<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>Master,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2672>cursed<s%> is <S%G3583>withered<s%> away.
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2192>Have<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> Be you <S%G142>removed,<s%> and be you <S%G906>cast<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and shall not <S%G1252>doubt<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> but shall <S%G4100>believe<s%> that those things <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> shall <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass; he shall <S%G2071>have<s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> he said. <S%G3004><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3745>What<s%> things soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> you <S%G154>desire,<s%> when you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> that you receive <S%G2983><s%> them, and you shall have <S%G2071><s%> them.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you do not <S%G863>forgive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, I will <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> of you <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>question,<s%> and <S%G611>answer<s%> me, and I will <S%G2046>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things.
The <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> was it from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G444>men?<s%> <S%G611>answer<s%> me.

And they <S%G3049>reasoned<s%> with <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> we shall <S%G2036>say,<s%> From <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> he will <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> did you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> him?
